code: import axios from"axios";import{URL}from"../../../apis";export var getArticle=function getArticle(slug,token){return axios.get("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/").concat(slug),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var deleteArticle=function deleteArticle(slug,token){return axios.delete("".concat(URL,"/api/articles/").concat(slug),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var postFollowing=function postFollowing(token,username){return axios.post("".concat(URL,"/api/profiles/").concat(username,"/follow"),{"Access-Control-Allow-Origin":"*","Access-Control-Allow-Credentials":true},{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};export var deleteFollowing=function deleteFollowing(token,username){return axios.delete("".concat(URL,"/api/profiles/").concat(username,"/follow"),{headers:{"Content-Type":"application/json",Authorization:"Bearer ".concat(token)}});};
